name: Tymon Kozłowski
story: Tymon Kozłowski is a former police officer who joined the INDEPENDENT as a Marksman after he was forced to retire due to an injury sustained in the line of duty. He takes pride in his sharpshooting skills and strives to excel in his role to prove to himself and to others that his usefulness is not diminished. Despite his quiet and reserved personality, he is a reliable team member who can be counted on to cover his comrades' backs.
